title.value: V2 Table: Supplemental Service Information Values

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify the supplemental service information sent between a placer system and a filler system for the universal procedure code reported in OBR-4 Universal Service ID. This specifies ordering information detail that is not available in other specific tables for fields in the OBR segment. These might be details such as whether a study is to be done on the right or left, for example, where the study is of the arm and the order master file does not distinguish right from left, or whether a study is to be done with or without contrast (when the order master file does not make such distinctions).

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0411 (Supplemental Service Information Values, version 2.9)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was first defined
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
Whether code is considered 'backwards compatible' (whatever that means)

display.value: Observation of type Newborn Dried Blood Screening (NDBS)
